topic.title: python code for reload all sites when change user
topic.body:
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
import json
import subprocess
from time import sleep


def main():
----ffss = open('sites.json', 'r')
----dictSites = json.load(ffss)
----ffss.close()
----dictsSitesName = {}
----sitesName = ''
----for key, val in dictSites.items():
--------siteName = "http://127.0.0.1:43110/"+key
--------openSite_cmd = 'google-chrome {0}'.format(siteName)
--------subprocess.Popen(
------------openSite_cmd,
------------shell=True)
--------sitesName = sitesName+'\n'+siteName
--------dictsSitesName[key] = siteName
--------sleep(15)
----ffss = open('sitesName.json', 'w')
----json.dump(dictsSitesName, ffss, sort_keys=True, indent=1)
----ffss.close()
----ffss = open('sitesName.txt', 'w')
----ffss.write(sitesName)
----ffss.close()


if __name__ in '__main__':
----main()
